message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $18,000, which reflects its true value. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than what I can accept. How about we meet in the middle? Would you be willing to go up to $15,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $15,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but that's as high as I can go.
